data.title: 7 The Concept of Education
data.meta_description:
7 the Concept of Education - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses key concepts related to education including:

1. The descriptive concept of education refers to what occurs in formal and non-formal learning institutions. 

2. The normative concept looks at the qualities of an educated person and effective educational processes. This includes developing understanding and reasoning abilities. 

3. Teaching involves consciously imparting knowledge to others, while activities like drill, instructing, and training focus more narrowly on skill acquisition than developing the whole person.
